name: Candoo Ninja
overview: Candoo Ninja (or Ninja I in Brazil) is a ninja-centric action/platform game released on the MSX. It was developed by Mass Tael Ltd. and published by ASCII Corporation (Japan) and Sharp Corportation (Brazil). The game is very similar to more well-known ninja games such as Ninja Gaiden and Shinobi; however, it predates both of these more famous games.
